categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Merinda Niemeh was a female Sullustan technician who was employed by the High King of Hargeeva to upgrade the technology in the Royal Palace during the Galactic Civil War. During an uprising, she formed a friendship with the King's son, Stevan, and followed him when he joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In 3 ABY, she was stationed at Eyrie Base.
